inscription:
Inscription; Mark
in brown ink, bottom recto: [Capote de Dentelle. Chale tissu cachemire garni de dentelles. Mlle Paron. Chale de guipure Mr. Camille. Paille de rig(?) Mr Feijay(?)]
medium: Graphite and watercolor heightend with gouache
portfolio: From one of three fashion journals:  La Sylphide, 1839-1844; La Mode, 1829-1854; Le Bon-Ton, Paris, 1834-1874
title: Two Women with a Dog
